title: VA - One Love One Rhythm (The 2014 Fifa World Cup Official Album
description:
VA - One Love One Rhythm (The 2014 Fifa World Cup Official Album) [Brazilian Deluxe Edition] + Bonus Tracks

Fifa World Cup Official Album features several world-renowned musical superstars who will add their distinctive sounds to the rhythm of footballÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s flagship event. Shakira, who sang the Official Song of the 2010 FIFA World Cup and Ricky Martin, who has recorded the winning track from this yearÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Supersong contest, are joined by Carlinhos Brown, Bebel Gilberto and several other leading names from the Brazilian music scene. This limited Brazilian Deluxe Edition features bonus tracks performed by Sergio Mendes, Black Eyed Peas, Santana and Brazil's current biggest singer and live performer, Samuel Rosa, as well as exclusive and previously unreleased remixes.

1. Pitbull Feat. Jennifer Lopez & Claudia Leitte - We Are One (Ole Ola) (the Official 2014 Fifa World Cup Song) (3:43)
2. Santana & Wyclef Feat. Avicii & Alexandre Pires - Dar Um Jeito (We Will Find A Way (the Official 2014 Fifa World Cup Anthem) (3:48)
